CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Lateral: Numerous Internal Failed Auths
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Multiple, unique unsuccessful login attempts from an internal host are made on the same impacted host within a short period of time.
UTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Lateral: Dispersed Internal Failed Auths
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: The same internal account unsuccessfully attempts to authenticate to multiple hosts within a short period of time.
UTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Lateral: Brute Force Internal Auth Failure
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Multiple failed authentication attempts from the same internal origin host to the same impacted host, without seeing an authentication success.
UTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Misuse: Excessive Browsing
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Excessive network connections (default of 100 in 1 minute) on ports 80 or 443.
Network Analytics - NTA

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NERC-CIP : Misuse Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on misuse activity within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: NIST 800-53 : Misuse Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on misuse activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: GPG-13 : Misuse Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This report directly supports GPG-13 controls PMC5.2, PMC5.4, and PMC5.8 by providing details of all misuse activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: SANS: Misuse Event
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Any misuse activity within the organization infrastructure. SANS Top 20

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Recon: Disabled Admin Access Failures
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Recently disabled or deleted privileged user account tries to authenticate or access resources on the network unsuccessfully.
UTD

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CSF: Misuse Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on misuse activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Recon: Disabled Account Auth Failures
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Recently disabled or deleted account unsuccessfully tries to authenticate or access resources.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Misuse: Misuse Event
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Any misuse activity within the organization infrastructure.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: BSI:IT-G: Möglicher FTP-Server gestartet
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: BSI: IT-Grundschutz: M 2.75 Geeignete Auswahl eines Application-Level-Gateways
Es wurde auf Port 21/TCP unerlaubt ein Prozess gestartet, der auf Port 21/TCP lauscht.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: HSS: Misuse Rule
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on misuse activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: CCF: Misuse
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: This AIE Rule provides details on misuse activity.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Lateral: Brute Force Internal Auth Failure
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Multiple failed authentication attempts from the same internal origin host to the same impacted host, without seeing an authentication success.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Lateral: Numerous and Dispersed Internal Fail
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: The same internal account unsuccessfully attempts to authenticate to multiple hosts within a short period of time.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Lateral: Numerous Internal Failed Auths
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Multiple, unique unsuccessful login attempts from an internal host are made on the same impacted host within a short period of time.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Recon: Disabled Account Auth Failures
CommonEvent.ShortDesc: AIE: Recently disabled or deleted account unsuccessfully tries to authenticate or access resources.

CommonEvent.Name: AIE: Recon: Disabled Admin Access Failures
CommonEvent.ShortDesc:
AIE: Recently disabled or deleted privileged user account tries to authenticate or access resources on the network unsuccessfully.
UTD
